# Vif

> Declarative screen capture and demo automation for macOS. Built for AI agents and LLMs. Define demo sequences in YAML, automate app interactions, record videos.

Vif automates demo recordings by connecting to your app via HTTP (VifTargets SDK), querying available UI targets, and executing scene sequences (click, type, navigate, voice). It's designed for agentic workflows where AI assistants iterate on video production through natural conversation.

## Agentic Control

For programmatic control without YAML scenes:

```bash
vif serve                           # Start automation server
vif-ctl backdrop on                 # Show backdrop
vif-ctl cursor move 500 300 0.5     # Move cursor
vif-ctl label show "Demo text"      # Show label
vif-ctl panel headless on           # Enter headless mode
vif-mcp                             # MCP server for Claude
```

Keyboard: `Escape` exits headless, `⌃⌥⌘V` toggles headless, `⇧⌘X` clears stage.

- [MCP Server](https://github.com/arach/vif/blob/main/src/mcp/server.ts): Model Context Protocol server
- [Scene DSL Parser](https://github.com/arach/vif/blob/main/src/dsl/parser.ts): YAML scene types and parsing
